de.sarahw.ma.phone
Class DBAdapter

java.lang.Object
  de.sarahw.ma.phone.DBAdapter

public class DBAdapter
extends Object

The DBAdapter. Handles all database queries / requests via a DBOpenHelper.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Sarah Will
